Jersey_City.330 Hudson: 330 Hudson is a building located at 330 Hudson Street, in the Hudson Square/SoHo neighborhoods of Manhattan, New York City. Plans for developing the building began in 2011 when landlord Trinity Real Estate signed a 99-year lease agreement with Beacon Capital Partners. The agreement sought to transform the building into a 350,000-square-foot finished office space, retail space at the base, attracting a variety of commercial tenants.
